mapper.insert: insert into warehouse_output_sheet (id, operator, create_time, `state`, sale_sheet_id) values (#{id}, #{operator}, #{createTime}, #{state}, #{saleSheetId})
mapper.select: select * from warehouse_output_sheet order by id desc limit 0,1;
mapper.insert:
insert into warehouse_output_sheet_content (warehouse_output_sheet_id, pid, quantity, sale_price, remark, batch_id) values
(#{item.warehouseOutputSheetId},#{item.pid},#{item.quantity},#{item.salePrice},#{item.remark},#{item.batchId})
mapper.select: select sum(quantity) from warehouse_output_sheet_content where warehouse_output_sheet_id in (select id from warehouse_output_sheet where create_time between #{beginTime} and #{endTime} and state = '审批完成');

SELECT wosc.id, wosc.pid, wosc.warehouse_output_sheet_id, wosc.batch_id, wosc.quantity, wosc.sale_price, wosc.remark FROM warehouse_output_sheet wos LEFT JOIN warehouse_output_sheet_content wosc on wos.id = wosc.warehouse_output_sheet_id WHERE wos.sale_sheet_id = #{saleSheetId} AND wosc.pid = #{pid};

select wos.id as id, wos.create_time as date, c.name as client, wos.operator as operator from warehouse_output_sheet wos left join seec_erp.sale_sheet ss on wos.sale_sheet_id = ss.id left join customer c on ss.supplier = c.id where wos.create_time between #{beginTime} and #{endTime}
